launcher_for_ubuntu module¶

It is a launcher for starting subprocesses for server_dist and clients of two types: senders and listeners. for more information: https://stackoverflow.com/questions/67348716/kill-process-do-not-kill-the-subprocess-and-do-not-close-a-terminal-window

launcher_for_ubuntu.main(clients)¶

PyQT Chat
